It is the Divine system that He has created us inferior in some%0D%0Arespect or the other. There is therefore no need for women to feel ashamed%0D%0Aof the fact that they have been granted less of one quality than men.%0D%0A%0D%0AIt is rational to accept that not all humans are not of equal intelligence.%0D%0AIt therefore follows that some are more intelligent than others are i.e.%0D%0Aothers are inferior in intelligence.
